name: Nonbiri Relax
summary: "Nonbiri" in Japanese translates to "spending leisurely" or "taking it easy." As the name suggests, this app allows you to enjoy a relaxed and unhurried experience. There are six different spaces available, each with its own unique ambiance. (The number of spaces is expected to increase in the future.) These spaces encompass various settings, such as a crackling campfire or a tranquil rain environment. There are no time constraints, allowing you to spend as much time as you like in each space.
